text: Awon olujokoo sinu ile ninu awon onigbagbo ododo, yato si awon alailera, ati awon olujagun fun esin Allahu pelu dukia won ati emi won, won ko dogba. Allahu fi ipo kan soore ajulo fun awon olujagun fun esin Allahu pelu dukia won ati emi won lori awon olujokoo sinu ile. Olukuluku (won) ni Allahu se adehun ohun rere (Ogba Idera) fun. Allahu gbola fun awon olujagun esin lori awon olujokoo sinu ile pelu esan nla
